reviewText: This is a great representation of people with color making a blunt straight to the point /classy movie. A New Mentality is very real and needs to be seen by the masses. Nikki Dacosta gets a two thumbs up for her part in this breath of life we must classify as a movie. Ronald Dillard Jr (director) is on his way. Peace and blessings to you.
i enjoyed the realistic storyline on relationships and the choices made in life and love that either make us or break us. cool ending. short movie worth a peep!
